body:
- Changed to cmake package with backward compatibility with older  makefile
- Added new version 5.2.2 which  necessary change to external blas variable
- Removed unused cmake variable 'blas_blas_libs'
- Remove unused tcsh dependency
- Change URL to use git repository for current and future versions
- Add older 4.2 version
- Add conflict for older versions with apple-clang
- Update smoke test for new EXAMPLE dir
title: SuperLU: new version and cmake tweaks
